test_repositories.description: Popular Python HTTP library - well-maintained, good test case

test_repositories.name: Flask Web Framework

test_repositories.name: Simple Python Project

test_repositories.name: Django Web Framework
test_repositories.description: Large Django framework - stress test for the agent
test_repositories.expected_issues: Complex codebase, many files, various issue types

expected_bug_types.example: LINTING error in src/utils.py line 15 → Fix: remove the import statement
SYNTAX error in src/validator.py line 8 → Fix: add the colon at the correct position
LOGIC error in src/main.py line 23 → Fix: use == for comparison
TYPE_ERROR in src/calc.py line 45 → Fix: convert types before concatenation
IMPORT error in src/module.py line 3 → Fix: use absolute imports
INDENTATION error in src/func.py line 12 → Fix: use consistent indentation

dashboard_test_scenarios.expected_behavior: Should complete successfully with minimal issues found
Should handle large codebase, may take longer, should find multiple issues
Should fail gracefully with clear error message
Should sanitize names properly for branch creation
